```{r fig.width=7}
# Generate synthetic data
data <- AirPassengers
result <- generate_synthetic_ts(data, length_out = 144, 
                                n_sim = 5, seed = 123)

# Plot different visualizations
plot(result, type = "series", which_sim = 1)           # Series comparison
plot(result, type = "residuals")                       # Residual diagnostics
plot(result, type = "acf", which_sim = 1)              # ACF comparison
plot(result, type = "density", which_sim = 1)          # Density comparison
plot(result, type = "qq", which_sim = 1)               # Q-Q plot

# Get comprehensive summary with hypothesis tests
summary_result <- summary(result)
print(summary_result)
```
